overview: Collection of four short films from Nova. "Buff It Up" —These two industrious young cleaners not only do a complete job on the house, they find time to do an in-depth job on each other.  "Workman's Comp" — Employer upset with the mess you made? Distract, soothe and drive home the deep pleasures of that huge, tireless tool…tickle his gullet with throbbing thickness…stretch his willing, moist ass with some hard, deep plunging.  "A Friend In Need" — Ross is so horny he can't keep his mind on his homework. However, his buddy Marc is exactly the right guy to call in a situation like this.  "The Spirit Is Willing" — When the spirit is willing the flesh is sure to follow, as Dino finds out the hard way when he comes for a visit with his old Army buddy.
title: 4 In Hand
